file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: API V1
  version: v1
paths:
  "/disasters":
    get:
      summary: list disasters
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
  "/disasters/{id}":
    parameters:
    - name: id
      in: path
      description: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    get:
      summary: show disaster
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
  "/posts":
    get:
      summary: list posts
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
    post:
      summary: create post
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                body:
                  type: string
              required:
              - name
              - body
  "/posts/{id}":
    parameters:
    - name: id
      in: path
      description: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    get:
      summary: show post
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
  "/stats/year/{year}":
    parameters:
    - name: year
      in: path
      description: year
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    get:
      summary: year stat
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
  "/stories":
    get:
      summary: list stories
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
  "/stories/{id}":
    parameters:
    - name: id
      in: path
      description: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    get:
      summary: show story
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
servers:
- url: https://{defaultHost}
  variables:
    defaultHost:
      default: candle-c4k.herokuapp.com
